long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Measure your daily developer productivity by tracking metrics that are more focused towards developers. It takes less than a minute every day. There's a dashboard view to keep track of how you're doing!

The questions are based off of a research done by Microsoft, GitHub and University of Victoria. They've called it the SPACE framework. It provides a holistic approach to measuring developer productivity. Happi uses this framework and helps you track your developer productivity and find areas where you can do improve.
